int KMP(string s,string p){
    int m=s.size();
    int n=p.size();
    if(m==0){
        return 0;
    }
    //â¬‡ï¸è®¡ç®—nextæ•°ç»„
    vector<int>next;
    int j=0;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        while(j>0 && p[i]!=p[j]){
            j=next[j-1];
        }
        if(p[i]==p[j]){
            j++;
        }
        next[i]=j;
    }
    //â¬‡ï¸KMPæœç´¢åŒ¹é…
    int j=0;
    for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
        while(j>0 && s[i]!=p[j]){

        }
        if(s[i]==p[j]){
            j++;
        }
        if(j==n){
            return i-n+1;
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

class Solution {
public:
    bool checkStraightLine(vector<vector<int>>& coordinates) {
        int x1,y1,x2,y2;
        x1=coordinates[0][0];
        y1=coordinates[0][1];
        x2=coordinates[1][0];
        y2=coordinates[1][1];
        if(coordinates.size()==2){
            return true;
        }
        for(int i=2;i<coordinates.size();i++){
            int x3=coordinates[i][0];
            int y3=coordinates[i][1];
            if((y2-y1)*(x3-x1)!=(x2-x1)*(y3-y1)){
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool lemonadeChange(vector<int>& bills) {
        int five=0,ten=0;
        for(int bill:bills){
            if(bill==5){
                five++;
            }
            else if(bill==10){
                if(five!=0){
                    five--;
                    ten++;
                }
                else{
                    return false;
                }
            }
            else if(bill==20){
                if(ten>0 && five>0){
                    ten--;
                    five--;
                }
                else if(five>=3){
                    five-=3;
                }
                else{
                    return false;
                }
                
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> plusOne(vector<int>& digits) {
        int len=digits.size();
        if(digits[len-1]!=9){
            digits[len-1]+=1;
        }
        else{
            int cnt=0;//è®°å½•9å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé9å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡å³ä¸ºlen-cnt-1
            for(int i=len-1;i>=0;i--){
                if(digits[i]==9){
                    cnt++;
                }
                else{
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(cnt==len){
                digits.insert(digits.begin(),1);
                for(int i=1;i<len+1;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
            else{
                int index=len-cnt-1;
                digits[index]+=1;
                for(int i=index+1;i<len;i++){
                    digits[i]=0;
                }
            }
        }
        return digits;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {
        bool increase=true,decrease=true;
        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
            if(nums[i+1] > nums[i]){
                decrease=false;
            }
            if(nums[i+1] < nums[i]){
                increase=false;
            }
        }
        return decrease || increase;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    unordered_map<char,int>mymap={
        {'I',1},
        {'V',5},
        {'X',10},
        {'L',50},
        {'C',100},
        {'D',500},
        {'M',1000},
    };
    int romanToInt(string s) {
        int ans=0;
        int len=s.length();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            if(mymap[s[i]]<mymap[s[i+1]]){
                ans-=mymap[s[i]];
            }
            else{
                ans+=mymap[s[i]];
            }
        }
        return ans;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) {
        int len=s.length();
        int m=0,n=0;
        for(int i=len-1;i>0;i--){
            if(s[i]!=' ' && (s[i+1]==' ' || s[i+1]=='\0')){
                m=i;
            }
            if((s[i-1]==' ' || s[i-1]=='\0') && s[i]!=' '){
                n=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        return m-n+1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    string longestCommonPrefix(vector<string>& strs) {
        if(!strs.size()){
            return "";
        }
        int len=strs[0].size();
        int cnt=strs.size();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            char c=strs[0][i];
            for(int j=1;j<cnt;j++){
                if(i==strs[j].size() || strs[j][i]!=c){
                    return strs[0].substr(0,i);
                }
            }
        }
        return strs[0];
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int calPoints(vector<string>& operations) {
        vector<int>ans;
        for(string ch:operations){
            if(ch=="+"){
                ans.push_back(ans[ans.size()-1]+ans[ans.size()-2]);
            }
            else if(ch=="D"){
                ans.push_back(ans.back()*2);
            }
            else if(ch=="C"){
                ans.pop_back();
            }
            else{
                ans.push_back(stoi(ch));
            }
        }
        return accumulate(ans.begin(),ans.end(),0);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        while(nums.size()!=1){
            if(target<nums[0]){
                return 0;
            }
            for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){
                if(nums[i]==target){
                    return i;
                }
                else if(nums[i]<target && nums[i+1]>=target){
                    return i+1;
                }
            }
            return nums.size();
        }
        return (target<=nums[0])? 0:1;
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int searchInsert(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int left,right;
        left=0;
        right=nums.size()-1;
        while(left<=right){
            int mid=left+(right-left)/2;
            if(nums[mid]==target){
                return mid;
            }
            else if(nums[mid]<target){
                left=mid+1;
            }
            else{
                right=mid-1;
            }
        }
        return left;
    }
};
